item.title: 10 Greatest Eddie Murphy Movie Characters
item.description: Eddie Murphy has had a fantastic career in comedic and dramatic movies, and his unique talents have led to some truly amazing movie characters.

item.title: Sequel To 18-Year-Old Cult Horror Movie In Development, Original Director & Cast Returning
item.description: New Zealand's most unlikely horror hit Black Sheep returns 16 years later, as the cult classic horror comedy is receiving a surprise sequel.

item.title: Meet Me Next Christmas Cast & Character Guide
item.description: Netflix's holiday rom-com Meet Me Next Christmas includes an impressive cast featuring Christina Milian and many impressive up-and-coming actors.
